Sentencas: The concept of a feasible operating area for a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant is introduced by establishing the relationship between the stack terminal voltage, fuel utilization, and stack current.
Titulo: An analysis of the control and operation of a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant in an isolated system

Sentencas: The analysis shows that both the terminal voltage and the utilization factor cannot be kept constant simultaneously when the stack current changes.
Titulo: An analysis of the control and operation of a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant in an isolated system

Sentencas: This leads to the two possible control strategies as constant utilization control and constant voltage control.
Titulo: An analysis of the control and operation of a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant in an isolated system

Sentencas: By controlling the input hydrogen fuel in proportion to the stack current, constant utilization control can be accomplished.
Titulo: An analysis of the control and operation of a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant in an isolated system

Sentencas: By incorporating an additional external voltage-control loop, stack terminal voltage can be maintained constant.
Titulo: An analysis of the control and operation of a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant in an isolated system

Sentencas: The detailed design of the control schemes is described.
Titulo: An analysis of the control and operation of a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant in an isolated system

Sentencas: The effectiveness of the proposed schemes is illustrated through simulation.
Titulo: An analysis of the control and operation of a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant in an isolated system

Sentencas: Using the numerical results, the maximum value of load power change that the plant can handle safely is predicted.
Titulo: An analysis of the control and operation of a solid oxide fuel-cell power plant in an isolated system
